japanese: （何だよ……こんな朝早くに……）
translation: (What the... This early in the morning?)

japanese: ……誰だ？
translation: ...Who is it?

japanese:
おはよう、フー君。
起こしちゃってごめんなさい。
translation:
Good morning, Fu-kun.
Sorry for waking you.

japanese:
……二乃か。
入っていいぞ。
translation:
...Nino?
Come on in.

japanese: お邪魔しまーす。
translation: Excuuuse me...

japanese:
おはよう。
一体なんの用だ、こんな朝っぱらから……。
translation:
Morning.
What the heck is going on, being this early....

japanese:
早く目が覚めちゃって。
せっかくだし、一緒に朝の散歩なんてどう？
きっと気持ちいいと思うの。
translation:
I woke up early and thought it would be nice
to take a morning stroll together.
I think it will feel good.

japanese:
散歩ねぇ……。
まあ、俺も目が覚めちまったし、いいぞ。
translation:
A stroll, huuuh...
Well, I'm already awake, so let's go.

japanese:
やった♪
じゃあ決まりね、行きましょ！
translation:
Yay! ♪
Alright then, let's go!

japanese:
いや、さすがにこの格好ではな。
とりあえず着替えるから、部屋の外で待っててくれ。
translation:
Well, I can't go like this.
I'm gonna change first, so wait for me outside,
would you?

japanese:
はーい。
待ってるから早くね。
translation:
Okaaay.
I'm waiting, so hurry.

japanese:
（朝から元気なやつだな……。
　とりあえず着替えるか）
translation:
(She's so lively in the morning...
 I'll just get changed then.)

japanese:
（これでよし、と。
　さて……んん？）
translation:
(There we go.
 Alright... Hmm?)

japanese:
あんたには関係ないでしょ？
ほっときなさいよ。
translation:
It's none of your business, is it?
Just leave me alone.

japanese: そういうわけにはいきません！
translation: I can't do that!

japanese:
（二乃と……たぶん五月だな。
　あいつら、人の部屋の前でなにやってんだ？）
translation:
(Nino and...probably Itsuki.
 What are they doing in front of my room?)

japanese: おい、なにやって――
translation: Hey, what are you doing%p-2;――

japanese:
いいじゃない、散歩くらい。
どうしてあんたに止められないといけないのよ。
translation:
It's fine, we're just going for a walk.
Why do you have to stop us?

japanese:
よくありません！
２人きりでなんて……！
translation:
It's not fine!
Just the two of you...!

japanese:
（えええー……。
　いきなり姉妹ゲンカが始まってる……）
translation:
(Whaaa...
 There's suddenly a sisters' quarrel...)

japanese:
あ、おはようございます、上杉さん。
これは一体、何事ですか？
translation:
Ah, good morning, Uesugi-san.
What exactly is going on here?

japanese: 俺が聞きたい。
translation: I wanted to ask the same thing.

japanese:
はっ！？　四葉までいつの間に！
それに上杉君も……。
translation:
Huh?! When did you get here, Yotsuba?
And Uesugi-kun too...

japanese:
おはよう、五月。
朝っぱらからなんなんだ、これは。
translation:
Good morning, Itsuki.
What's with all the commotion so early in the morning?

japanese:
上杉君は気にしないでください！
ちょうど、その……。
translation:
Don't worry about it, Uesugi-kun!
That was, um...

japanese:
に、二乃と四葉と、
朝の散歩に行こうと思っていまして！
translation:
I-I was thinking of going on a morning stroll with Nino
and Yotsuba!

japanese:
はあっ！？
ちょっと、なに勝手に……。
translation:
Huh?!
Wait a minute, you can't just decide on your own...

japanese: いいから！　行きましょう、二乃！
translation: It's fine! Let's GO, Nino!

japanese:
ちょ、ちょっと引っ張らないでよ！
服が伸びちゃうでしょ！？
translation:
H-hey, don't pull me like that!
My clothes will get all stretched out!

japanese:
失礼します、上杉君！
また朝食のときに！
translation:
Excuse us, Uesugi-kun!
We'll see you at breakfast!

japanese: お、おう。
translation: O-okay.

japanese:
えっと、よくわかりませんが、
私も呼ばれてたので一緒に行きますね。
ではでは！
translation:
Umm, I'm not really sure what's going on,
but I was invited too, so I'll go with them.
See you later!

japanese: （なんだったんだ、一体……）
translation: (What was that all about...)
